website_summaries.verdict: This heavily padded bag works for a variety of telescopes and is made of durable water-resistant nylon.
pros: A reliable bag that includes several smaller bags for other equipment
The adjustable dividers help to prevent scratches, and the zipper is durable
Can be carried with the shoulder strap or hand straps
Measures 29.7 inches by 10 inches by 9.5 inches
cons: No guidelines on how to store telescope and other equipment, so some experimenting may be necessary
Does not always fit a telescope and a tripod

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough for EQ130
customer_reviews.text: This bag will NOT hold an EQ130, tripod and mount. You can squeeze the tube and tripod in there but not much else. The bag you get it not the long one you see in the pictures. The bag feels durable. Attaching picture showing the bag with tripod and EQ130 stuffed in there and mount sitting beside it that I have to carry separately.
customer_reviews.author: Greg D.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: My powerseeker 127EQ fits nicely in the bag with all the accessories. I'm glad I got this because it make it so much easier to unpack and pack up the telescope when I want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: nitejoker

customer_reviews.title: the bag is extremely heavy- not meant to be carried for long periods of time- more like to your car and then to where it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is heavily padded and the handles are well-placed and hardy. The telescope parts fit well inside, but then, of course, the bag is extremely heavy- not meant to be carried for long periods of time- more like to your car and then to where it is that you are setting up. The case is water[roof and looks attractive. I bought it for my ORION, and would have liked for it to say RION, but it is not a deal-breaker. Good purchase - I'm happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: cori

customer_reviews.title: Love this carry bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I did SO long without one of these! It's better than the pics of it. I got everything plus the tripod easily into the bag. Everything is protected as there is plenty of padding and it is designed with protection in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L Brown

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product.
customer_reviews.text: The product is fabulous. It holds all my equipment just right and the padding is excellent, which was my biggest concern for both storing and traveling with my equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Sebro

customer_reviews.title: Multi telescope, use alternative padding.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get a Celestron Astromaster 130 and all her accessories in this bag. It’s a nice bag, but it’s not a good cusion. I use foam padding and tie it down when traveling. It will not fit a tripod. It’s perfect if you have a couple of small telescopes and don’t want to buy a case for each.
customer_reviews.author: Mayor McCheese

customer_reviews.title: Shoul have come with better Instuctions
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with any instructions on how to store the telescope in the bag. I had to figure out the best way I could. Some example photos on possible placement in the bag would have been helpful. Other than the lack of detail instructions, the bag is solidly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Leadman97

customer_reviews.title: EQ mount will not fit....
customer_reviews.text: Scope and most accessories fit, but forget about the bulky EQ mount...Had to buy a foam case at Harbour Freight and keep it separate. Little bummed that it wasn't mentioned in the add.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The size right enough for nexstar 127slt telescope.
customer_reviews.text: The size of the bag is right enough for my telescope celestron nexstar 127slt computerized telescope. The protective padding on top side of bag is excellent, but the side and the bottom side not as great as the top side. Over all the bag is very good at its protective purpose for transporting the telescope.
customer_reviews.author: Noy D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made,  padded, and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty canvas bag. Well made, padded, with lots of room for telescope and accessories. Smaller bags for accessories are inside. It will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Well Crafted
customer_reviews.text: One cannot say enough. Buy this when and where available. Solidly built inside and outside. Please make sizes for refractive telescopes also.
customer_reviews.author: Lego Sailplane10

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty decent bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent bag. I feel it will protect my telescope when I carry it around, but still gotta be careful. It was a tight squeeze and I had to look at some pics to see how others got stuff in, but it all fit including all the accessories I have like the motor and other lenses. Only reason for 4 stars is how tight it was (little trouble closing zipper)
customer_reviews.author: CM Healy

customer_reviews.title: Celestron 130SLT
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm completely satisfied. I have the Celestron 130slt and it fits perfectly. The case came with several padded pouches for lenses and batteries or whatever you need. I was not able to fit the tripod in the bag with everything else, but I am ok with that. The important part is packed up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: 127EQ PowerSeeker Tube Rings, Equatorial mount don't fit in the bags provided.
customer_reviews.text: Padding that separates tube and tripod NOT provided - As shown in the picture. I bought this bag thinking it was designed for Celestron 127EQ. Unfortunately - the title is quite misleading. Extremely disappointed with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: yashas prakash

customer_reviews.title: excellent protection and convenience for an Orion 120mm short tube ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the bag. This bag is very well constructed and provides, in my opinion, excellent protection and convenience for an Orion 120mm short tube refractor OTA and an ES AR102 OTA. It will provide excellent protection for any OTA's of similar or smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: Things fit but
customer_reviews.text: It could be a lot better suited for this model of scope. You really have to be creative in cramming everything in. And you still feel like things will get scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis H.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Nice to store everything and makes travel easier
customer_reviews.author: Linda Decker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag to store and carry your telescope.
customer_reviews.author: StealthBarganHunter

customer_reviews.title: Celestron Telescope!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome purchase to allow me to travel with my telescope.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Good quality construction, good zippers, and solid stitching. I will be keeping this bag even though my Powerseeker 80EQ telescope will not completely fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This fit my daughters telescope perfectly. I liked the extra pouches for the extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great bag Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Great bag Lots of room. Lots of padding but absolutely no guide on how to pack the scope so just go it your self and figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Makes it very easy to transport to a location and also helps keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed to have a carry case for telescope that we use for camping. Bag is large enough for scope and lenses but not for tripod. Makes it very easy to transport to a location and also helps keep it safe while in transit
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great and the entire telescope fits in very snuggly. It did take some doing to get the zipper closed, but it's worth knowing the telescope isn't knocking around. There is a place for every piece of the telescope. All in all great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits my telescope perfectly. The extra included bags are great for all the accessories. This is just what I was looking for to easily transport and store my telescope.
customer_reviews.author: AJ's Mom

customer_reviews.title: A very nice and Ez telescope for rookies I start on the ...
customer_reviews.text: A very nice and Ez telescope for rookies I start on the the moon and its so clear Check the image, but u know that the real image directly from the the scope is more clearly than taking it through mobile camera. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mr.dhari

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: If you bought the scope you owe it to yourself to pick this up too. It is a very well constructed durable thick tough fabric case with room for all the parts that came with the scope (including separate straps for both the tripod and the scope) and includes padded zipper cases for the lens and such - all in all the perfect accessory to protect and haul everything.
customer_reviews.author: AnInterestedConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag, great for transporting
customer_reviews.text: This bag was exactly what I needed. Bought my son his telescope last year and have had nowhere to store it. This bag fit his Celestron power seeker telescope wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: jonah s

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, very well insulated. Took my scope on a 2k mile drive. Nothing shifted and everything was intact. 4 stars because there were no clear cut instructions for best placement in the package. I used pics online.
customer_reviews.author: BLot

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Celestron 127eq Telescope or any 5" Telescopes
customer_reviews.text: Very good bag for celestron 127eq telescope with good padding all round and lot of custom compartment space. Perfect for travel :-)
customer_reviews.author: TheDarkKnight

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: "Okay". The case seems just a "tad" to the small side; however, IS functional.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Carbee

customer_reviews.title: The bag itself is nice and the quality seems good
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is nice and the quality seems good. The adjustable dividers aren't the best, but they work. It was way too big for my needs and I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet but glad I have it
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly and as advertised. Haven't used it yet but glad I have it. t
customer_reviews.author: gary1959

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, padding is sturdy though not super thick. Bought it for a Celestron 130SLT which fits nicely (though snuggly) inside. Fits the mount, optical tube and a few accessories (but not the tripod). Just what I wanted a nice compact set-up for portability.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: The telescope and attachments fit perfectly... very happy with this product...
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice to have had a little more room.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley White

customer_reviews.title: I just love it. Was exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I just love it.Was exactly what I was looking for. Very durable and fit all devices.
customer_reviews.author: Hernani

customer_reviews.title: Its great product but did not fit my telescope like I ...
customer_reviews.text: Its great product but did not fit my telescope like I expected maybe it wasn't proper fit but over all still good product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The bag shipped did not match the dimensions i the add or the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lupton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how everything fit perfectly into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: Product does not match description
customer_reviews.text: My telescope bag arrived without the internal divider or any of the smaller component bags. Without the internal divider to protect the telescope tube, this bag is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, some of the additional bags are smaller than I thought, but it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and the recipient was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Extremely  Happy! Glad I chose this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: The telescope bag was perfect, great price, well made and large enough to carry all my equipment, tripod a box of eyepieces, as well as my fold up chair. These people are great and go out of their way to help!! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PHIL

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with any instructions on how to pack the telescope.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Schmedel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great for my husband's telescope. great quality bag and great size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & fit!
customer_reviews.text: The case fit our Telescope perfectly even though we have a different telescope! I was concerned our TS would fit but the measurements of the bag are very generous!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Woll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, a little small but still very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful case
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described. Have already used it to transport my Celestron Cometron telescope and equipment. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: gtkvan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought most of the parts for the telescope would not fit in. But everything worked out good.
customer_reviews.author: phantommaster

product_meta.title: Telescope Bag for Celestron 127EQ | AstroMaster 114EQ | Red Fox Padded Telescope Carrying Bag
product_meta.description:
Top-Of-The-Line Protection:You’ve put a lot of thought into purchasing and maintaining your telescope; we’ve put a lot of thought into building a case that gives top-of-the-line protection to your gear. Loaded with well-thought-out features, the Red Fox padded telescope bag keeps your equipment safe while you’re on the go or just storing your gear safely at home. Features include:
Strong Waterproof Material:Constructed of strong, water-resistant nylon with padding sewn into the inner case lining on all sides, the bag cushions and protects even your fragile gadgets.
Five Bonus Accessory Cases:You’ll also get five well-constructed smaller cases in a variety of shapes and sizes to safely house your accessories and keep you organized.
Adjustable Internal Padded Divider:You can wall off your optical tube from your mount and tripod with the soft, padded divider to keep your tube separate and safe. The cushioned divider attaches to the bottom of the case with self-stick material. The divider’s shape can be adjusted and is also completely removable.
Adjustable Inner Straps:Four adjustable straps attached inside the case’s bottom allow you to tightly secure your optical tube and tripod, keeping the parts snugly in place.
Adjustable Shoulder Strap:The case features an adjustable shoulder strap as well as two hand straps that can be secured with a self-stick closure, making the bag easy to grip and transport.
Outer Zipper Pocket:The bag has an external 13” x 8.5” zipper pocket, perfect for carrying instruction manuals or other odds and ends you might need to reach for frequently.
Dimensions:29.7” long x 10” wide x 9.5” high. Fits the Orion 09798, Celestron 31045, Celestron 127EQ Powerseeker and other similarly sized models.
Attractive Design:Keep your gear safe and arrive in style with this sleek, stylish-looking black carrying case!
feature_bullets: PROTECT YOUR PRIZED GEAR – The padded Red Fox telescope case with adjustable padded divider allows you to safely transport your Celestron 127EQ Powerseeker , Celestron - AstroMaster 114EQ and similarly sized telescopes, so you can view the cosmos almost anywhere! Also ideal for keeping dust out and preventing accidental damage at home, for worry-free storage.

FIVE BONUS SMALLER CASES – You get five smaller cases included with your padded Red Fox telescope case, to help keep all your accessories organized. Stash the smaller cases, which handily come in various shapes and sizes, wherever you’d like once you pack up your scope, and know everything’s safe and secure as you travel.

KEEP EVERYTHING SAFE – The telescope carrying bag’s internal padded divider separates the optical tube from the mount and tripod to keep all parts safe. The padded divider is adjustable, as it can be detached from the self-stick closures on the case’s bottom, allowing you to customize the fit for ultimate security.

EXCELLENT QUALITY & DESIGN – Made of durable, water-resistant nylon with padding sewn into the inner case lining, the Red Fox telescope case is built to withstand all the elements you encounter on your journeys. The case also features adjustable straps inside the bottom of the bag to secure your telescope's different components.
DIMENSIONS – 29.7 long x 10 wide x 9.5 high inches. Case features an adjustable-length-shoulder-strap and hand straps with self-stick closure. Five bonus cases: sizes vary.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
